general_medical_specialists.name: Allergists/Immunologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Specialize in allergic diseases and immune system disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Anesthesiologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Manage pain and care before, during, and after surgery.

general_medical_specialists.name: Cardiologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on heart and cardiovascular system disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Dermatologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat skin, hair, and nail diseases.

general_medical_specialists.name: Endocrinologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Deal with hormonal disorders, including diabetes.

general_medical_specialists.name: Gastroenterologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Specialize in the digestive system and its disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Geriatricians
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on health care for elderly patients.

general_medical_specialists.name: Hematologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat blood disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Infectious Disease Specialists
general_medical_specialists.description: Manage infections and diseases caused by microorganisms.

general_medical_specialists.name: Internal Medicine Specialists
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on adult medicine and have expertise in diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of diseases.

general_medical_specialists.name: Nephrologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat kidney diseases and disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Neurologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Specialize in disorders of the nervous system.

general_medical_specialists.name: Obstetricians/Gynecologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on women's health, including childbirth.

general_medical_specialists.name: Oncologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat cancer.

general_medical_specialists.name: Ophthalmologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat eye and vision problems.

general_medical_specialists.name: Orthopedic Surgeons
general_medical_specialists.description: Deal with the musculoskeletal system.

general_medical_specialists.name: Otolaryngologists (ENT Specialists)
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on ear, nose, and throat disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Pathologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Study causes and nature of diseases.

general_medical_specialists.name: Pediatricians
general_medical_specialists.description: Specialize in children's health.

general_medical_specialists.name: Physiatrists
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on rehabilitation and physical medicine.

general_medical_specialists.name: Plastic Surgeons
general_medical_specialists.description: Perform reconstructive or cosmetic surgery.

general_medical_specialists.name: Podiatrists
general_medical_specialists.description: Specialize in foot and ankle disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Psychiatrists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat mental disorders and conditions.

general_medical_specialists.name: Pulmonologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Focus on lung and respiratory diseases.

general_medical_specialists.name: Radiologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Use imaging to diagnose and treat diseases.

general_medical_specialists.name: Rheumatologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat rheumatic diseases and arthritis.

general_medical_specialists.name: Sleep Medicine Specialists
general_medical_specialists.description: Diagnose and treat sleep disorders.

general_medical_specialists.name: Urologists
general_medical_specialists.description: Treat disorders of the urinary system and male reproductive organs.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Sports Medicine Physicians
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Diagnose and treat sports-related injuries and conditions.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Orthopedic Sports Medicine Surgeons
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Focus on the surgical treatment of sports injuries.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Physical Therapists
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Help patients recover from injuries and improve mobility.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Athletic Trainers
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Prevent, diagnose, and treat muscle and bone injuries and illnesses.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Exercise Physiologists
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Analyze patients' fitness to help them improve health and maintain physical wellness.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Sports Nutritionists
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Provide nutritional guidance to enhance athletic performance.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Sports Psychologists
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Address mental and emotional aspects of sports and exercise.

sports_medicine_specialists.name: Chiropractors
sports_medicine_specialists.description: Specialize in the manual adjustment or manipulation of the spine to maintain sports health.
